scripts.clean-all: npm run remove-package-lock && npm run remove-maven-folders && npm run remove-node-modules
scripts.remove-node-modules: lerna exec -- rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf node_modules
scripts.remove-package-lock: lerna exec -- rm -rf package-lock.json && rm -rf package-lock.json
scripts.remove-maven-folders: lerna exec -- rm -rf target npm && rm -rf target npm
